locationServices.title: Location-Based Services Terms
locationServices.content:
Location-Based Services Terms

1. Location Information Collection and Use
- Providing nearby match finding services
- Providing pickleball court search services
- Providing distance-based notification services

2. Consent for Location Information
- Users may refuse location information provision at any time
- Refusing location information may limit some service features

3. Location Information Protection
- Collected location information is encrypted and securely stored
- Not provided to third parties without user consent

liabilityDisclaimer.title: Liability Disclaimer
liabilityDisclaimer.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT LEGAL NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è

Lightning Pickleball app serves as a platform to connect individual pickleball players.

WE DO NOT ASSUME ANY LEGAL LIABILITY for:

1. Safety Incidents Disclaimer
- Injuries or accidents during pickleball matches
- Personal disputes between match participants
- Safety incidents at pickleball court facilities

2. Financial Disputes Disclaimer
- Disputes related to match costs
- Issues related to court rental fees
- Financial transactions between users

3. User Responsibility
- All safety and responsibility for matches belong to hosts and participants
- Users must verify their health condition before participating
- Appropriate insurance coverage is recommended

By using this service, you agree to these disclaimer terms.

marketingCommunications.title: Marketing Communications Consent
marketingCommunications.content:
Marketing Communications Consent (Optional)

1. Content
- New features and service updates
- Special events and promotion announcements
- Useful pickleball-related information and tips
- Partnership benefits and discount information

2. Delivery Methods
- Push notifications
- Email
- In-app notifications

3. Opt-out
- You can opt-out anytime in settings
- Selective opt-out available for individual notifications

This consent is optional and refusing won't limit your service usage.

inclusivityPolicy.title: Diversity & Inclusion Policy
inclusivityPolicy.content:
üåà Diversity & Inclusion Policy and Disclaimer

Lightning Pickleball is a platform open to all users.

1. Inclusivity Principles
- All users have equal access to our services regardless of gender, sexual orientation, or gender identity.
- LGBTQ+ users can participate in all activities (match creation, participation, club activities, etc.) without restrictions.
- All users must adhere to principles of mutual respect.

2. Program Error Disclaimer
- Program errors may occasionally cause unintended restrictions on some features.
- Such errors are not intentional discrimination and will be corrected upon discovery.
- You agree not to file legal lawsuits for feature restrictions caused by program errors.

3. Anti-Discrimination
- Discriminatory speech or behavior based on gender, sexual orientation, or gender identity is prohibited.
- Discriminatory behavior may result in service restrictions.

By agreeing to this policy, you acknowledge understanding and acceptance of these terms.

aiChat.welcome:
Hello! I'm your Lightning Pickleball App Helper. üéæ

I'm ready to help you with app usage and all your pickleball questions:

üì± App Usage
‚Ä¢ Creating matches/meetups
‚Ä¢ Joining and managing clubs
‚Ä¢ ELO ranking system
‚Ä¢ Doubles participation

üéæ Pickleball Knowledge
‚Ä¢ Technique and strategy advice
‚Ä¢ Rules and scoring explanations
‚Ä¢ Equipment recommendations

What can I help you with today?

If you experience any issues while using the app, please let me know. Just mention the 'problem' and we'll fix it.
